artifactId.description: The artifact id for the pom file.

groupId.description: The group id for the pom file.

host.description: The host connection property. Currently this only works with the Solace binder. Example: tcp://myhost.com:55555.

javaPackage.description: The java package to put classes in.

password.description: The client password connection property. Currently this only works with the Solace binder.

username.description: The client username connection property. Currently this only works with the Solace binder
